ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Fishing Nets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct basic fishing nets out of wood and cloth to catch fish in shallow water.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Complex Fishing Nets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct complex fishing nets out of metal and cloth to catch fish in shallow or chest deep water.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Fishing Nets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct advanced fishing nets, equipped with sensors and electronic lures, in deeper water.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Ice Fishing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct fishing nets designed to catch fish under the ice.
